amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by ICE to process the release of, or administer alternatives to detention for illegal immigrants who commit serious crimes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of section 236(c) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1226(c)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Cravaack.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
